replies.msg: Barcelona want to continue rejuvenating the squad and will meet shortly to discuss and plan signings and sales. The club can spend around 75 million euros, but this figure may well vary in case of many departures, which would leave Barça with a greater budget. [md]

The topic of Valverde will also be discussed at the meeting. The coach has an option to extend his contract with another season and that's what Barça would like to happen. However, it will solely be Valverde's decision and the club are preparing for what may come. [md]
